about_the_game:
The Growing Evil

The Growing Evil is a continuation from The Great Voyage, the party just arrives at Islandria. The adventures just arrived at Novecskal with a warm welcome. Although the mood is not warm at all, everything is dark and dreary. The adventures will have to fight something new and strong that almost brought this village to extinction.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: William Rongholt

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
